SEARCH
Package com.mygdx.game

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.game.GameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameState extends Object implements Serializable
Stores all information for a game state

Including the difficulty, player list, which player's turn it currently is, the round number, the map of game board tiles, number of stars, and the available stocks. Can be saved and loaded. Used to update student profiles at the end of a game.
Author:
Franck Limtung (flimtung), Kevin Chen (kchen546), Earl Castillo (ecastil3)
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GameState

      public GameState(List<PlayerProfile> profileList, com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager assets, int id, boolean hardMode) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructor initializes a new game state.
      Parameters:
      profileList - List of students participating in the game
      assets - AssetManager used to load assets
      id - Unique ID of the gameState. Used to cleanup saves after termination of a game
      hardMode - controls if hard mode is enabled
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the profile list is null or empty

  • Method Details

    • loadTextures

      public void loadTextures(com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager assets)
      Re-initialize objects owned by the GameState which couldn't be fully serialized.
      Parameters:
      assets - an AssetManager loaded with all the assets required by the GameState

    • nextRound

      public void nextRound()
      Moves to the next round in the game.

      Each turn, dividends are paid out and stocks are updated. Every 2 rounds, each player's level is increased. Every 5 rounds, new items are added to the game board.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      End the current Player's turn, and start the next Player's turn

    • globalPenaltyEvent

      public void globalPenaltyEvent(int penaltyAmount)
      Global penalty event for event node.

      In easy mode, the penalty reduces all player's money by a given amount, unless the player currently has a negative amount of money. In hard mode, it reduces all player's stars by 1. If the player does not have a star, it reduces their money by the given amount. If the player has a shield, they are protected from the penalty's effects.
      Parameters:
      penaltyAmount - Amount to reduce each player's money.

    • checkStar

      public void checkStar(Map<String,Node> nodeMap)
      Adds a star to the game board. Run when there are fewer stars on the game board than the per turn limit. Generates a random number between mininum and maximum allowed number of stars.
      Parameters:
      nodeMap -

    • removeStar

      Parameters:
